articles.author: Allison Chinchar, CNN Meteorologist
articles.description: The US averages over 1,150 tornadoes every single year. That's more than any other country in the world. In fact, it's more than Canada, Australia and all European countries combined.
articles.title: Here's why the US has more tornadoes than any other country - CNN
